lung_check_text1: Lung Check is a tracking tool that can help you and your GP understand how COPD impacts your life over time. From your symptoms to your mood. Tracking your COPD makes it easier to personalise advice and optimise outcomes.
lung_check_assessment_home_text_1: Over time, Lung Check builds a picture of how COPD affects your quality of life.
lung_check_assessment_home_text_2: Track progress to see where you're doing well and where you need help.
lung_check_assessment_home_text_3: Access tips and tricks to get the most from life with COPD.
lung_check_assessment_home_text_4: Have more constructive conversations with your doctor.
step_counter_text: ON AVERAGE, DURING THE PAST WEEK, HOW OFTEN DID YOU FEEL
homepage_text1: Use this calculator to find out your lung age.
homepage_text2: Use this application to see how COPD affects your life.
